entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
